name: 2D Platformer- vTutorial
description:
Credit- MSU Games and Stacy Jenkins

For my 2DPlatformer Modifications, I hope to:

  • Design Modification- Design a New Level and modify the instructions menu.
  • Aesthetic Modification- I still want to learn how to reskin a character and put in a new environmental challenge. Not Acid, but I wonder if I could tweak that for something in the air, while the player jumps.
  • Gameplay Modification- I think we saw how to add Fighting to our player, I would like to try adding this ability.
